Couldn't sit through this one myself the quality was really bad. I've seen worse, but not much worse. I've actually heard good things about the movie, so im waiting for a better copy to come out to watch it fully. Cam is too close, cuts out half the screen, picture quality is pretty bad. It's pretty dark. This is in no way bitching, i'm not going to bitch about anything I don't got to pay for, I'm just giving a heads up.
